t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: I purchased my flowbee 11 years ago, and not a single person has cut my hair but me ever since AND the price of 79.95 today is exactly what I paid for it 11 years ago. Will have to spring extra for tax and shipping and handling but certainly not the price here.

t: Flowbee Haircutting System Review - HairClippersClub
s: March 20, 2025 - The Flowbee is the pioneer in this market and my father used it when I was a kid, so I’m partial to it. However, the Robocut vacuum cutter is also worth looking into.
